          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Il cervello umano</string>
            <string language="en">The Human brain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das menschliche Gehirn</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le cerveau humain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O cérebro humano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο ανθρώπινος εγκέφαλος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El cerebro humano</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Un piccolo puzzle: attribuisci correttamente il nome ad ogni area cerebrale</string>
            <string language="en">A small puzzle. Name the centers of the brain right.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Il cervello</string>
            <string language="en">the brain</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein kleines Puzzlespiel. Benennen Sie die 
Mitten des Gehirnrechtes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un petit puzzle. Nommez les centres de la 
droite de cerveau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um enigma pequeno. Nomeie os centros da 
direita do cérebro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας μικρός γρίφος. Ονομάστε τα κέντρα του 
δικαιώματος εγκεφάλου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un rompecabezas pequeño. Nombre los centros
de la derecha del cerebro.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">das Gehirn</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">le cerveau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-el">ο εγκέφαλος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el cerebro</string>
